message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $11,500. I believe this offer represents a fair deal considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $10,800. How about we settle at $11,200? That's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,900 for the product. Can you meet me halfway again?
